homePage.calculatorSubtitle: Get an approximate treatment cost based on German DRG rates
homePage.calculatorInfo: Here you can get an approximate idea of treatment costs using German DRG tariffs. In Turkey many procedures are 20–30% cheaper, in Israel prices are generally higher (but sometimes lower if done on an outpatient basis), and in Spain costs are roughly on par with Germany. We clarify all details and prepare a full offer for you in advance so you know what to expect.
homePage.calculatorGuideTitle: How to use the DRG calculator:
homePage.calculatorGuide1: Start typing the DRG code or procedure name and select from suggestions.
homePage.calculatorGuide2: Enter the hospital base rate (LBFW) in EUR — you can find it on the clinic’s website or ask your coordinator.
homePage.calculatorGuide3: Specify the length of stay in days (minimum 3).
homePage.calculatorGuide4: Click “Calculate” to see all cost components included.
